title: november 24: a, b, c, Darwin
description:
Today on the pod, Maia tells the story of how we got here—in a manner of speak. That’s to say, Maia goes over Charles Darwin’s OG theories on evolutionary biology. She then talks about a more recent history, the tragedy of Freddie Mercury’s death. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
